verses.name: Luke 5:36
verses.text: And he spake also a parable unto them; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old; if otherwise, then both the new maketh a rent, and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old.

verses.name: Luke 5:37
verses.text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles; else the new wine will burst the bottles, and be spilled, and the bottles shall perish.

verses.name: Luke 5:38
verses.text: But new wine must be put into new bottles; and both are preserved.

verses.name: Luke 5:39
verses.text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new: for he saith, The old is better.
